author: world today news
title: “Jung Joon-young took off his pants, took footage, and fed his sleeping pal” Wanting again on the previous
text:
Singer Jung Joon-young. © News1
Webtoon author Park Tae-jun’s interview about singer Jung Joon-young, a principal member of ‘Burning Solar Gate’ that occurred 5 years in the past, is being reviewed.
A video beforehand posted on the ‘eNews24’ YouTube channel attracts consideration to the thirteenth. In November 2012, the channel posted a video titled ‘Jung Joon-young’s personal life revealed by K4 Celebrity’s closest pal Park Tae-joon.’
Earlier than that, Jung Joon-young earned the nickname ‘4th Dimension’ whereas showing on ‘Celebrity K4’. So, the manufacturing crew requested Park Tae-jun, generally known as Jung Joon-young’s finest pal, about Jung Joon-young’s ‘actual look.’
First, Park Tae-jun mentioned, “What made me so offended after I was watching the printed was that they solely edited what was broadcastable, in order that’s simply the extent of . If you see it in actual life, (the absence) is past phrases. If you meet in actual life, it is like 100 dimensions (as a substitute of 4 dimensions).”
Relating to Jung Joon-young’s ‘4D conduct’, Park Tae-joon mentioned, “I went to the lavatory and instantly 4 folks ran as much as me and took off my pants. After which I took an image of it.” He continued, “Out of the blue I gave alcohol to my sleeping pal. I heard he did it as a result of it was enjoyable. He’s a baby of darkness.”
(eNews Seize)
Throughout the broadcast, about how pleasant Jung Joon-young was with different contestants, he mentioned, “Perhaps as a result of I lived overseas (after I was younger), his thoughts could be very open to me You and I’ve nothing. they’re all yours and all are yours.” “It is simply that I’ve so little, so everybody’s issues are mine,” he defined.
He then confirmed, “Even when he involves my home to go to, he provides all the pieces he has to his buddies and takes all the pieces I’ve. If it wasn’t even a bit of close to him, he can be like a thief.”
Additionally, relating to Jung Joon-young’s relationships with ladies, Park Tae-joon mentioned, “Jun-young does not go round assembly this girl or that girl. As a result of he thinks of everybody as his pal, he has many shut buddies. He mentioned, “If different folks see that, it would come off as Casanova.” “I believe so,” he mentioned.
When the manufacturing crew often requested, “Have you ever ever seen ladies work on one thing?” Park Tae-joon replied, “No. Jun-young does not ask for work typically. The truth is, he stays quiet. I suppose that works.”
Lastly Park Tae-jun mentioned, “For those who end in 4th place, you’re going to get a automobile, and Jun-young mentioned he would give it to your mom. It was an enormous shock, and I noticed it once more .” “I hope you do higher sooner or later, pay again the cash you borrowed from me, and stay fortunately for a very long time.”
Netizens who rewatched the video mentioned, “To summarize, the hidden cameraman is a thief who takes footage of individuals by eradicating their pants and he will not pay the cash again,” “It is an interview, so when you ship. in a pleasant approach, that is about it. For those who hear fastidiously, it is garbage,” and “It is scary to see it once more.” Feedback like “He stands out,” “Park Tae-joon spoke very calmly,” and “I assumed Jung Joon-young can be like this after seeing this interview on the time” had been feedback. to go away
